item.description:
This Meet Up Group is held on the second Saturday every month from 1-3pm. We have a large, outdoor, fenced-in play yard and a large, indoor play room as well. Your dog may run around, off leash, in a safe environment with no worries! All breeds and sizes are welcome.


PS - If you would like your dog groomed after them meet up let me know prior to the 9th and we can schedule an appointment with a 25% off discount. If you have any questions give me a call or send me an email.
item.how_to_find_us: Ask anyone at the front desk!

group.name: The Greater Boston Active Dogs Meetup Group

item.name: The Greater Boston Active Dogs Meetup Group Monthly Meetup
